utterance.speaker: The Singing Man
utterance.content: Morning’s here! Sunshine is here! The sky is clear, the morning’s here! The morning’s here!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: HEY!! Do you have to do that? It’s Saturday!

utterance.speaker: The Singing Man
utterance.content: Oh come on! Morning’s here! Morning’s here! The morning is here! Sunshine is here!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I hate this apartment! I hate the color of these walls! I hate the fact that this place still smells like bird! I hate that singing guy!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you kidding? I love that guy! Morning’s here! Morning is here—

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Stop it! I will kill you. I hate the fact that my room is so small.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, I have all the space I need. Just do what I did.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, you don’t even have a bed, you sleep in a ball on the floor!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know what? I am really tired of your bellyaching! Okay, I-I worked really hard at making this a nice place for us to live!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m sorry. I’m so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: See, this is a great apartment.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Shut up! This place is a hole!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Oh, blimey, I still can’t believe you’ve got an earring!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh? I know, I know. Who am I? David Bowe?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: He does that?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, I don’t know, whatever.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: I think it makes you look really dangerous.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I know. Y’know what, I never would’ve gotten this if it weren’t for you. No really, when I’m with you I’m-I’m like this whole other guy, I love that guy! I mean, I love you too, a lot, but that guy! I-I love that guy!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: I love both of you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: I wish I didn’t have to go.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Then don’t. Stay here. Just don’t go so soon to London, just one more day.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Ohh, Ross, please!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: One more day, seriously/

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Don’t do this to me, again. You’d know I’d stay here in a minute, but I’d really miss so much work, they’ll fire me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, then you can stay as long as you want.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: I wish I could.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh no. Don’t, don’t, don’t start packing. Come on!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: I don’t think you understand packing. Look, I just don’t want to leave it to the last minute. Last time I left in such a rush, I left my knickers here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I know, I uh, I tried them on.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: You didn’t!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. No, I didn’t. I didn’t want to be that guy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hello!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ho! Ho! Ho!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Excuse me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Your pants!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, yeah! You like ‘em? I just, I went to a used clothes store and got a bunch of maternity stuff. These are sooo comfortable!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, Pheebs, those are uh, those are Santa pants.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Santa pants. Santa Claus’s pants.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nuh-uh! They’re maternity pants. They even came with a list of baby names. See, these names are good, and these names are bad. Ohh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So—Hey, Pheebs! So, how are the elves?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don’t know! How are the-the-the-the, y’know—You’re clothes aren’t funny.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, guys, what-what should I wear to a Knicks game?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uhh, a T-shirt that says, "I don’t belong here."

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You have Knicks tickets?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, my mom got my dad’s season tickets in the divorce, so she just gave them to me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, apparently, they’re pretty good seats.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God! Those are almost right on the floor!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Do you guys want these?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah we do!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, well you got ‘em.

utterance.speaker: Both
utterance.content: All right!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Just give us our apartment back!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Boy! I didn’t see that coming!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you serious?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, come on! We know what these are worth.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, what, do you think we’re stupid?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You’re not stupid. You’re meaner than I thought.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What do you say?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Forget it! Okay, I’m not giving up my bachelor pad for some basketball seats!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You’re bachelor pad?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Have you even had a girl up here?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No. But uh, Joey has, and I usually talk to them in the morning time.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, you do!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, Gunther, can I get two cups of chino, please?

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Good one.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on, season tickets! Season tickets, do you know what that means?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Forget it! Okay, I’m not giving up the apartment.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh come—look, when I was a kid my dad’s company gave season tickets to the number one salesman every year, all right? My dad never won! Of course, he wasn’t in the sales division, but still, I never ever, ever forgot that!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, guys!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We don’t make enough fun of you already?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh yeah, Emily convinced me to do it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You do know that Wham broke up?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I like it, and Emily likes it, and that’s what counts. So uh, how are you guys doing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh-no, don’t try and talk all normal with that thing in your ear.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Where is Emily?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ugh, she’s saying good-bye to her uncle.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Man, didn’t she like just get here?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!! Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Easy tiger.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I just, I hate this so much! I mean, every time I go pick her up at the airport, it’s-it’s so great. But at the same time I’m thinking, "Well, I’m gonna be right back there in a couple of days, dropping her off."

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So what are you going to do?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nothing! There’s nothing to do! I mean, she lives there, I live here. I mean, she-she’d have to uh, move here. She should move here!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I could ask her to live with me!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you serious?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I mean, why not! I mean, I mean why not?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Because you’ve only known her for six weeks! Okay, I’ve got a carton of milk in my fridge I’ve had a longer relationship with!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look guys, when I’m with her it’s-it’s-it’s like she brings this-this-this great side out of me. I mean I-I-I love her, y’know?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And I love the milk! But, I’m not gonna some British girl to move in with me! Joey, you say things now.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right look, Ross, he’s right. Emily’s great, she’s great! But this way too soon, you’re only gonna scare her!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t want to do that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! You don’t want to wreck it, you don’t want to go to fast!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, no, you’re right, I know, you’re right, I’m not, I’m not gonna do it. All right, thanks guys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, no problem, just remember to wake us up before you go-go.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s too hard. Too hard!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right boys, last chance for the tickets!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Or I’ll give them to my new boyfriend, Joshua.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No thank you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wait-wait-wait-wait! Come on! Come on, let’s trade! The timing’s perfect, I just clogged the toilet!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, I want those basketball seats as much as you do! Okay, but we can’t leave in the small apartment after we’ve lived here! Didn’t you ever read Flowers for Algernon?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes! Didn’t you ever read Sports Illustrated?! No! I didn’t read yours! But come on, we can go to the game tonight!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, the only way I will even consider this is if they offer a lot more than just season seats.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It’s the Knicks!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Screw the Knicks!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I didn’t mean that. I just meant that the apartment is worth so much more.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Huh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And the Knicks rule all.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, the Knicks rule all!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, so? Are you gonna do it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No. No. We’re not gonna do that, y’know why? Because its not an even trade.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, okay, look, what if you could keep the apartment and get the tickets?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Done!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Let me finish.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m talking about a bet, winner takes all.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh, we could end up with nothing.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Or you could end up with everything.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh, I like that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, so what do you say?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, just do it!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Op, op, I’m convinced!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on man, you know I’d do it for you! Because, you’re my best friend.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right, but you can’t use that again for a whole year. I’m in.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, this is so exciting! Ooh, God, what are you going to bet?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, okay, well, I think we should let Phoebe decide, because she’s the only who’s impartial, and she’s so pretty.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay. Umm, ooh, ooh—oh, I have a game!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: This is great!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What’s the game?! What’s the game?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, well, it doesn’t have a name—oh, okay, Phoebeball! No, it doesn’t have a name. Umm, okay, Monica, what is your favourite thing about trees?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: They’re green?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Good! Good! Five points!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, Joey, same question.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, they’re tall.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, three points. Both fine answers, but we were looking for leafy, leafy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s not even a game!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Shut up! We’re winning!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You wanna finish this right now? All right, we get a deck of cards, high card wins. What do you say?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Fine, let’s do it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I have cards!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, good.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! Here! Oh no, these are the trick deck. Okay. Here yes. Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, you guys uh, you guys pick first

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. Four.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s a low one!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Okay. Phoebe, you look, I can’t.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What make you think I can?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Okay. Ace!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why are you screaming and hugging?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Because we won our apartment back!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What? Ace is high! Jack, queen, king, ace!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! Ace is low! Ace, two, three, four!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don’t know. Ooh! Ooh! Look it! Ah-ha!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, cut, let’s pick again, pick again.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Come on apartment! Come on apartment! Oh! I know queen is high!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh-huh, not as high as… It worked! King!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah baby!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But, we pick again! We pick again!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t know!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Tickets please! That’s courtside baby!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Seriously, good game though. Good game. What are they so mad about? They get the apartment back!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No they didn’t!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: I packed while you were gone. I left some knickers under your pillow.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Move in with me.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Don’t be scared, I-I know it sounds crazy and-and people will say it’s too soon, but just-just think, think how great it will be.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Ohh, no. Ugh. Oh, leaving London, my whole family lives there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: My job!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, so, you-you’ll get a job here! I mean, I’m always hearing about uh, them foreigners coming in here and stealing American jobs; that could be you!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Yeah, but it-it-it’s my whole life—you come to England.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I can’t. I would, I really would, but my son is here; I can’t leave him. Isn’t—you don’t think there’s any way?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Ohh, I don’t think so. I mean it would be different if it was way into the future –and-and-and we were getting married or something.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Oh no, no, right I shouldn’t have said married. Uh, please don’t go freaky on me. I didn’t mean it. Well, I didn’t say it; I take it back!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, don’t. Why don’t we?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Why don’t we what?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Get married.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: You are mad!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No! I’m not! It’s-it’s-it’s perfect! I mean it’s better than you just-just moving here, ‘cause it’s us together forever, and that’s-that’s what I want.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: We’ve only known each other for six weeks!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I know, so what? I mean, who’s-who’s to say? Does that me we-we can’t do it? Look, huh, I was with Carol for four years before we got married and I wound up divorced from a pregnant lesbian. I mean, this, this makes sense for us. Come on! I mean, on our first date we ended up spending the whole weekend in Vermont! I mean, last night I got my ear pierced! Me! This feels right. Doesn’t it?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: My parents are going to be really mad.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is that—are you saying yes? Is that yes?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes! We’re getting married?!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: We’re getting married!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come here, come here. Uh, ow! Emily, will you marry me?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Ohh, it’s a bit small.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Damn! I thought that was going to be romantic as hell!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: It was.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Those were like the best seats ever.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh yeah. Hey! Should we give these shirts to the girls? Y’know, kinda like a peace offering.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah, that’s very nice. Plus, y’know they were free and they’re too small.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh. Oh, God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, want a beer? WHOA!!!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I KNOW!!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Open up! Open up! Open up!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We’ll discuss it, in the morning!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What the hell is going on?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We took our apartment back!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I had nothing to do with it. Okay, it was my idea, but I don’t feel good about it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We are switching back, right now!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, we’re not! We’re not leaving!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, you’re gonna have to leave sometime, because you both have jobs, and as soon as you do, we’re switching it back! There’s nothing you can do to stop us! Right, Joe?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t want to move again!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don’t care, this is our apartment! And they stole—you stole it—our apartment, and we won that apartment fair and square, twice! And I am getting it back right now. I’m getting back right now!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right. We figured you might respond this way, so we have a backup offer.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh no-no-no, no more offers. You can’t offer anything to us!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Let us keep the apartment and…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: As a thank you, Rachel and I will kiss for one minute.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Totally worth it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That was one good minute!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Good night.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Good night.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Men are such idiots.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! Can you believe that something that stupid actually got us our apartment back?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That’s so funny to think if you’d just done that right after the last contest, no one would have had to move at all.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, let-let-let’s pretend that’s not true.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, scarf’s done.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Come on! Come on. Come on.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What-what’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross has some big thing to tell everyone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uhh, okay, it’s uh, Emily and I, we decided to uh, to get married.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What? Oh, are you pregnant too?!

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Umm, no.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: When, when did—how, how did you…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We, we just decided to uh, to go for it.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: I mean, we know it’s a bit hasty but, uh, it just feels so right, so…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm, uh, I was just telling the guys…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I-I heard. I think it’s great! Ohh, I’m so happy for you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, well, that’s great!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can’t believe you’re getting married!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Monica and Rachel made out.

utterance.speaker: The Singing Man
utterance.content: Morning’s here! The morning’s here!

utterance.speaker: Both
utterance.content: Sunshine is here! The sky is clear, the morning’s here!

utterance.speaker: The Singing Man
utterance.content: Hey! You’re back!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Get into gear!

utterance.speaker: The Singing Man
utterance.content: Breakfast is near!

utterance.speaker: Both
utterance.content: The dark of night has disappeared!!

utterance.speaker: The Singing Man
utterance.content: I’ll see you tomorrow morning!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay!
